attributes.action: Stop giving tax dodgers Government positions, Honours and Peerages
attributes.additional_details:
Are you ashamed to have accepted dirty money in party donations which should have gone to schools and hospitals through taxes?

 Are you ashamed to have put party finances and support above what you know is right for the country? 

In times of austerity it is the charity workers,public sector workers who have had their pay frozen and volunteers who have stood strong for the country. What is it about tax dodgers who give you donations that you feel makes them more appropriate to give honours to?
attributes.background: You cannot with any integrity claim to be getting tough on tax avoidance whilst continuing to reward Conservative supporting tax dodgers with Government positions, Honours and Peerages. With 5 years as Prime Minister it is now time you get a backbone and honour the promise you made to the country.
